snippet: The police said that Vincent Arcona was present on Monday when three men were shot in a subway station after an argument at a McDonald’s on Eighth Avenue.
abstract: New York City police say Vincent Arcona was taken into custody after hospital workers in Bronx recognized him as wanted in connection with deadly shooting near Pennsylvania Station in Midtown Manhattan; Arcona had tried to submit himself for psychological evaluation; shooting left Angel Quinones dead and two others injured.
lead_paragraph: The police said that Vincent Arcona was present on Monday when three men were shot in a subway station after an argument at a McDonald’s on Eighth Avenue.

headline.main: Witness Held for Questioning in Fatal Subway Shooting
headline.print_headline: Witness Held for Questioning in Fatal Subway Shooting After Argument at a McDonald’s
